scorePolicy: Each student will prepare a 15-20min oral presentation on a text relevant to his or her MA thesis (30%); in addition, every week each student will send an email to me with commentaries, ideas, questions, etc. on the previous session’s presentation (20%). Finally, each student will write an 800 word term paper, due between December 16th and January 6th (30%). In-class participation will account for another 20% of the final grade.
